tool_description: Manages request timing and rate limiting to comply with website scraping policies and avoid being blocked.

requests_per_minute.description: Maximum number of requests allowed per minute

burst_limit.description: Maximum number of requests allowed in quick succession

backoff_multiplier.description: Multiplier for delay increase when rate limited

error_messages: Invalid rate limit: requests_per_minute must be a positive integer.
Invalid burst limit: burst_limit must be a positive integer less than or equal to requests_per_minute.
Invalid backoff multiplier: backoff_multiplier must be greater than 1.0.
usage: Configure rate limiting parameters based on target website policies. Call before each scraping request to get appropriate delay timing.

delay_seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait before next request

requests_remaining.description: Number of requests remaining in current time window

reset_time.description: Time when rate limit window resets
